S.FORM: Barbados hya' ga cyux maki' tay 13 10 N, 59 32 W na cung Meco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 430 sq km (maki' tay 202ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 430 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 291,495. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 32.60 , lhlahuy hya' ga 19.40 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 48 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Bridgetown. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mspat byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Elizabeth II, aring ryax tay 6 squ byacing tay 2 sa kawas 1952 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
